xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.6 Āsavavippayuttasāsavaduka, Kusalattika » 4.6.2 Abyākatapada » 4.6.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavavippayuttasāsavaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
56.
1697Āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo āsavavippayuttassa sāsavassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
57.
1698Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1699Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1700Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1701(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1702Āsavavippayuttasāsavadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
1703Āsavagocchakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetu-ārammaṇaup5 Saññojanagocchaka, Kusalattika >>
